title: Bloomberg Markets: Portell Says Amazon Could `Liven Up Retail'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Portell Says Amazon Could `Liven Up Retail'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Greg Portell Lead Partner of Consumer Industries and Retail Practice A.T. Kearney Discussing the impact of Amazon.com buying Whole Foods Market on the retail sector and future M&A activity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
